name: No Way Out (itch) (LonelyLionGames)
description:
After living a life of crime you die in a car crash during a high speed chase with the cops. Even you weren't exactly surprised to land in hell, but this can't be the end...

Run away from the devil for as long as possible, while the devil - knowing how much you hate trivia - has made a game out of every crossroad in his endless maze

Two of the roads are filled with traps while one is completely safe, but don't take too long to decide as the devil is right behind!

Can you juggle surviving many different traps and answering trivia all while running away from the devil?

Important: If the game asks for extra permissions (Windows Firewall popup) just deny them, I don't know why it sometimes does this...
